column4: when I try to install vmware, I get the following "None of the pre-built vmmon modules for VMware Workstation is suitable for your
running kernel.  Do you want this program to try to build the vmmon module for
your system (you need to have a C compiler installed on your system)?"
then I proceed and I am told that install could not find the make utility
you need GCC and make IIRC, if you have issues, you may also need the any-any patch
it did not ask, but even though by default it looks like dapper comes with 3.0 and 4.0 installed, I guess maybe it's looking for 3.4
depends on your install i think
i am running it on suse, i assume your stuck at config.pl?
